turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like to order a I would like to order coffee from Peet's Coffee, an espresso.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, which drink did you want to order from peet's?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like to order an iced latte, small, nonfat milk. That's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want any syrups for your drink.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, so you want a small Iced latte with non fat milk?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: $3.50 is your total. would you like me to charge the card on file now?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'll be picking it up at the Sudbury Sudbury, Massachusetts at 534 Boston Post Road.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, please show me right now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I've ordered your drink for you at Peet's on Sudeberry massechusets. and it should be ready for pick up in 9 minutes. Your receipt will be sent to your mobile device via text message shortly.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: anything else i can help with?
